proxyIssue.symptom: Failed to connect to github.com port 443 after timeout
proxyIssue.explanation: This is an issue coming during syncing because the proxy is not set up correctly. The proxy is set to http://127.0.0.1:50598. This is the default proxy for the system. We need to set the proxy to the correct one.

solution.recommended: Use system proxy settings in Git

alternativeSolution.description: Bypass proxy for GitHub (not recommended if proxy is required)

steps: Run test_connection.py to verify proxy settings
Try git fetch to test GitHub connection
Attempt git pull to ensure full functionality

commonIssues: Timeout errors indicate proxy connection is slow
Authentication errors might require proxy credentials
SSL errors might require certificate configuration
